item.title: Business Ready Plots with R
item.description: Quick Context Recently, I completed the Data Science for Business 101 course over at Business Science University. In the course, Matt Dancho teaches students the fundamentals of data science for business with the tidyverse. The course is jam packed with material and I highly recommend to anyone looking to advance their skills. Iâ€™ve been tracking down data then applying the techniques from the course to solidify what I learned in the course.
